title: "'AI everywhere' IoT chips coming from Arm"
excerpt: "The new machine-learning silicon will include micro neural processing units (microNPU) that can be used to identify speech patterns and perform other AI tasks. Importantly, the processing is accomplished on-device and in smaller form factors than have so far been available. The chips don't need the cloud or any network. RELATED: IoT catches on ..."
